data.title: Boston Celtics Roster
data.meta_description: Boston Celtics scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Tony Allen was selected as the #25 pick in the First Round of the 2004 NBA Draft by the Boston Celtics. Tony Allen signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics on July 2, 2004. Tony Allen re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Boston Celtics on July 19, 2008.

J.R. Giddens was selected as the #30 pick in the First Round of the 2008 NBA Draft by the Boston Celtics. J.R. Giddens signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics on August 25, 2008.

Paul Pierce was selected as the #10 pick in the First Round of the 1998 NBA Draft by the Boston Celtics. Paul Pierce signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics on January 21, 1999. Paul Pierce signed a multi-year extension with the Boston Celtics on August 1, 2001. Paul Pierce signed a multi-year extension with the Boston Celtics on July 18, 2006.

Gabe Pruitt was selected as the #2 pick in the Second Round of the 2007 NBA Draft by the Boston Celtics. Gabe Pruitt signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics on August 22, 2007.

Draft Rights to Glen Davis, the #5 pick in the Second Round of the 2007 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Boston Celtics from the Seattle SuperSonics on June 28, 2007. Glen Davis signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics on August 31, 2007.

Draft Rights to Kendrick Perkins, the #27 pick in the First Round of the 2003 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Boston Celtics from the Memphis Grizzlies on June 26, 2003. Kendrick Perkins signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics on July 9, 2003. Kendrick Perkins signed a multi-year extension with the Boston Celtics on September 11, 2006.

Draft Rights to Leon Powe, the #19 pick in the Second Round of the 2006 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Boston Celtics from the Denver Nuggets on June 28, 2006. Leon Powe signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics on July 14, 2006.

Draft Rights to Rajon Rondo, the #21 pick in the First Round of the 2006 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Boston Celtics from the Phoenix Suns on June 28, 2006. Rajon Rondo signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics on July 3, 2006.

Draft Rights to Henry Walker, the #17 pick in the Second Round of the 2008 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Boston Celtics from the Washington Wizards on June 26, 2008. Henry Walker signed a multi-year contract with the Boston Celtics on August 22, 2008.
